General.Description: GameCredits or GAME was born to drive the liquidity in a game cryptocurrency, created to facilitate in-game transactions and monetization. With more than 2.5 billion global users, GameCredits is actually an universal currency and virtual wallet. Especially, the GAME's platform brings about the customers a simple gateway to cryptographic payments for gamers and game developers needed.
General.Features: GameCredits (GAME) provides the participants an elegant, swift, safe platform. All the transactions in-game payment  will occur so fluently. GameCredits transactions can be conducted undentified. Moreover, it helps you to protect the privacy while you can enjoy your favorite games. In particular, all the credit card transactions process quickly solve just for a minute. With GAME, it is easy for your transactions to be liquided because it is compatible with all the payment systems.
General.Technology: GameCredits are based on blockchain, therefore, the transactions are permanent. Moreover, the security of GAME is such good as the online payment gateway and wallet will be protected totally. The platform also is functioned carefully, so it allows users to frictionlessly manage their balances and buy in-game content easily.Last but not least, built in collaboration with like minded Crypto Projects, the GMC's Platform can support multiple currencies, and to serve different purposes.
